name: 3D Landscape Creator
description:
、

Premise: 

In this game, you are the owner of this small world, your can use your power to create a lot of interesting landscapes, at the same time you can freely fly through those landscapes.

Enjoying creating your own landscape and browsing the landscape that you made ;

Control :  

  • create the river valley landscape: R key
  • creat the lava canyon landscape: E key
  • quit the game: Esc key

Camera Control: 

  • Use WASD to move the camera left, right, back, and forward 
  • Scroll the mouse wheel to move the camera closer or further to the landscape
  • hold and drag 

2-3 Things that  You Can See:

  • Highly simulate real mountains and valleys
  • Varied landscape texture
  • Automatically  generate plants and objects like rocks and bones on the landscape
